categories: Category:Star Wars Legends Epic Collection: The Rebellion

nodes.text: Star Wars Legends Epic Collection: The Rebellion Vol. 4

Star Wars Legends Epic Collection: The Rebellion Vol. 4 is the fourth Epic Collection trade paperback that collects several Star Wars titles originally published by Dark Horse Comics, all set in the Rebellion era. It was released on September 1, 2020.

The war against the Empire continues! Months after the Death Star's destruction, the Rebel Alliance has begun the fight to take apart the Empire piece by piece. Rebel strategist Jorin Sol has been rescued from the enemy's clutches - but is he now friend or foe? And Luke Skywalker's childhood friend, Imperial Lieutenant Janek "Tank" Sunber, claims he wants to join the Rebellion - but Princess Leia thinks it's a trap. Can Luke still trust his old friend? Plus: The cross-time "Vector" saga continues! Bounty hunter Boba Fett takes on a series of deadly assignments! Lando Calrissian moves to Cloud City - and much more!

COLLECTING: STAR WARS: REBELLION (2006) 1-16; STAR WARS: BOBA FETT - OVERKILL (2006) 1; STAR WARS: BOBA FETT (1997) 1/2; MATERIAL FROM STAR WARS: KNIGHTS OF THE OLD REPUBLIC/REBELLION (2006) 0; STAR WARS TALES (1999) 3, 15, 17, 21
